title: Bone
info: Bones are consumable     ranged / throwing weapons that also can be used as crafting materials. They are dropped by Angry Bones, Dark Casters, and Cursed Skulls, which spawn in the Dungeon. On the  3DS version, Bones are also dropped by normal Skeletons.
stat:

AmmunitionCrafting material

Research99 required
